ESP8266_IoT.connectKidsiot|block: 连接 KidsIot 平台使用 userToken: %userToken Topic: %topic
ESP8266_IoT.connectWifi|block: 连接WIFI无线网络 WIFI名称 = %ssid|WIFI密码 = %pw
ESP8266_IoT.disconnectKidsiot|block: 断开与 KidsIot 平台的连接
ESP8266_IoT.initWIFI|block: 设置 ESP8266 模块|RX %tx|TX %rx|波特率 %baudrate
ESP8266_IoT.setData|block: 设置发送到ThingSpeak平台的数据 | Write API key = %write_api_key|Field 1 = %n1||Field 2 = %n2|Field 3 = %n3|Field 4 = %n4|Field 5 = %n5|Field 6 = %n6|Field 7 = %n7|Field 8 = %n8
ESP8266_IoT.uploadKidsiot|block: 上传数据 %data 到 kidsiot 平台
